document_data.caption: A map showing the Leech (labeled #14) near the waterfront in Skuld.
document_data.name: The Leech
document_data.mainbody: The '''Leech''' was a [[tavern]] located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Leech was located in northwest Skuld in the [[Skuld/Port District|Port District]] on the waterfront of the [[Alamber Sea]]. Skuld's northern sea wall lay to the west of the tavern, while the merchant yards lay to the south.
